See you later!
Ever since I was a little girl,
translation.es: Desde pequeña, la gente siempre me dijo

translation.en: people always told me that I see things that no one else does.
translation.es: Desde pequeña, la gente siempre me dijo que veo cosas que nadie más ve.

translation.en: It wasn't just that my camera was a way for me to express myself.
translation.es: Mi cámara no era solo una forma de expresarme.

translation.en: It was the means by which I captured the unseen.
translation.es: Era el medio por el cual capturaba lo invisible.

translation.en: It was only recently that I discovered something that I had been blind to.
translation.es: Pero hace poco descubrí algo que no había podido ver.

translation.en: A ghost.
All of us, each and every one of us, are haunted by ghosts.
translation.es: Cada uno de nosotros está atormentado por fantasmas.

translation.en: The ghosts of childhood trauma.
The ghosts of unfulfilled dreams.
translation.es: Los fantasmas de los sueños no cumplidos.

translation.en: The ghosts of lost love.
Like so many people, I believed that if I just ignored these ghosts,
translation.es: Como mucha gente, creí que si ignoraba a estos fantasmas,

translation.en: they would eventually go away.
This turned out to be a mistake.
Just like all of our worst fears,
these invisible spirits gain strength in darkness.
translation.es: estos espíritus invisibles se hacen más fuertes en la oscuridad.

translation.en: If we run from them, they run faster.
translation.es: Si huimos de ellos, corren más rápido.

translation.en: If we push them away, they just push back harder.
translation.es: Si los empujamos, ellos nos empujan con más fuerza.

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
It has taken…
great personal loss
for me to discover the answer to this question.
We must attend to our ghosts.
We must welcome them into our lives
translation.es: Debemos darles la bienvenida a nuestras vidas

translation.en: as though they are part of us, because they are part of us.
translation.es: como si fueran parte de nosotros, porque lo son.

translation.en: It's only when we acknowledge their presence will they make room for new possibilities.
translation.es: Cuando reconocemos su presencia, dan espacio a nuevas posibilidades.

translation.en: In the end, I've learned that our ghosts are part of who we are,
translation.es: Aprendí que nuestros fantasmas son parte de quiénes somos y de lo que queremos ser.

translation.en: part of who we hope to be.
translation.es: son parte de quiénes somos y de lo que queremos ser.

translation.en: These hauntings stay inside us,
tethered to our hearts forever.
In life.
In death.
And… everywhere in- between.
translation.es: y en todos los puntos medios.
